en.name: Oil Mil
en.description: Our olives are pressed in a certified mill, with the classic method and cold extracted (<27 °).

it.name: Molitura
it.description: Le nostre olive vengono molite in frantoio certificato, con il metodo classico ed estratte a freddo (<27°).

fr.name: Mouture
fr.description: Nos olives sont broyées par le pressoir certifié suivant la méthode classique: extraction à froid (<27°).
